00032 #include "GHOST_SystemSDL.h"
00033 #include "GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL.h"

00035 #include "GHOST_WindowManager.h"

00037 GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL::GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL(GHOST_SystemSDL *system)
00038     :
00039       GHOST_DisplayManager(),
00040       m_system(system)
00041 {
00042     memset(&m_mode, 0, sizeof m_mode);
00043 }

00045 GHOST_TSuccess
00046 GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL::getNumDisplays(GHOST_TUns8& numDisplays) const
00047 {
00048     numDisplays=  SDL_GetNumVideoDisplays();
00049     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00050 }

00052 
00053 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL::getNumDisplaySettings(GHOST_TUns8 display,
00054                                                               GHOST_TInt32& numSettings) const
00055 {
00056     GHOST_ASSERT(display < 1, "Only single display systems are currently supported.\n");
00057 
00058     numSettings = SDL_GetNumDisplayModes(display - 1);
00059 
00060     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00061 }
00062 
00063 static void ghost_mode_from_sdl(GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting, SDL_DisplayMode *mode)
00064 {
00065     setting.xPixels = mode->w;
00066     setting.yPixels = mode->h;
00067     setting.bpp = SDL_BYTESPERPIXEL(mode->format) * 8;
00068     /* Just guess the frequency :( */
00069     setting.frequency = mode->refresh_rate ? mode->refresh_rate : 60;
00070 }
00071 
00072 static void ghost_mode_to_sdl(const GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting, SDL_DisplayMode *mode)
00073 {
00074     mode->w = setting.xPixels;
00075     mode->h = setting.yPixels;
00076     // setting.bpp = SDL_BYTESPERPIXEL(mode->format) * 8; ???
00077     mode->refresh_rate = setting.frequency;
00078 }
00079 
00080 GHOST_TSuccess
00081 GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL::getDisplaySetting(GHOST_TUns8 display,
00082                                            GHOST_TInt32 index,
00083                                            GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting) const
00084 {
00085     GHOST_ASSERT(display < 1, "Only single display systems are currently supported.\n");
00086 
00087     SDL_DisplayMode mode;
00088     SDL_GetDisplayMode(display, index, &mode);
00089 
00090     ghost_mode_from_sdl(setting, &mode);
00091 
00092     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00093 }
00094 
00095 GHOST_TSuccess
00096 GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL::getCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_TUns8 display,
00097                                                   GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting) const
00098 {
00099     SDL_DisplayMode mode;
00100     SDL_GetCurrentDisplayMode(display, &mode);
00101 
00102     ghost_mode_from_sdl(setting, &mode);
00103 
00104     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00105 }
00106 
00107 GHOST_TSuccess
00108 GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL::getCurrentDisplayModeSDL(SDL_DisplayMode &mode) const
00109 {
00110     mode = m_mode;
00111     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00112 }
00113 
00114 GHOST_TSuccess
00115 GHOST_DisplayManagerSDL:: setCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_TUns8 display,
00116                                                    const GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting)
00117 {
00118     /*
00119      * Mode switching code ported from Quake 2 version 3.21 and bzflag version
00120      * 2.4.0:
00121      * ftp://ftp.idsoftware.com/idstuff/source/q2source-3.21.zip
00122      * See linux/gl_glx.c:GLimp_SetMode
00123      * http://wiki.bzflag.org/BZFlag_Source
00124      * See src/platform/SDLDisplay.cxx:SDLDisplay and createWindow
00125      */
00126     SDL_DisplayMode mode;
00127     const int num_modes = SDL_GetNumDisplayModes(display);
00128     int best_fit, best_dist, dist, x, y;
00129 
00130     best_dist = 9999999;
00131     best_fit = -1;
00132 
00133     if (num_modes == 0) {
00134         /* Any mode is OK. */
00135         ghost_mode_to_sdl(setting, &mode);
00136     }
00137     else {
00138         for (int i = 0; i < num_modes; i++) {
00139 
00140             SDL_GetDisplayMode(display, i, &mode);
00141 
00142             if (setting.xPixels > mode.w ||
00143                 setting.yPixels > mode.h)
00144                 continue;
00145 
00146             x = setting.xPixels - mode.w;
00147             y = setting.yPixels - mode.h;
00148             dist = (x * x) + (y * y);
00149             if (dist < best_dist) {
00150                 best_dist = dist;
00151                 best_fit = i;
00152             }
00153         }
00154 
00155         if (best_fit == -1)
00156             return GHOST_kFailure;
00157 
00158         SDL_GetDisplayMode(display, best_fit, &mode);
00159     }
00160 
00161     m_mode = mode;
00162 
00163     /* evil, SDL2 needs a window to adjust display modes */
00164     GHOST_WindowSDL *win = (GHOST_WindowSDL *)m_system->getWindowManager()->getActiveWindow();
00165 
00166     if (win) {
00167         SDL_Window *sdl_win = win->getSDLWindow();
00168 
00169 
00170         SDL_SetWindowDisplayMode(sdl_win, &mode);
00171         SDL_ShowWindow(sdl_win);
00172         SDL_SetWindowFullscreen(sdl_win, SDL_TRUE);
00173 
00174         return GHOST_kSuccess;
00175     }
00176     else {
00177         /* this is a problem for the BGE player :S, perhaps SDL2 will resolve at some point.
00178          * we really need SDL_SetDisplayModeForDisplay() to become an API func! - campbell */
00179         printf("no windows available, cant fullscreen");
00180 
00181         /* do not fail, we will try again later when the window is created - wander */
00182         return GHOST_kSuccess;
00183     }
00184 }
